known_issues: Deployment/build process is failing intermittently ("hit a snag" / language model error), preventing successful deploy.

existing_features.title: Re-run the full build and deployment of the existing Finance Tracker app (Draft Version 2) to production on the Internet Computer, ensuring the process completes successfully end-to-end (frontend build, canister build, and deploy).

Identify and resolve any deterministic, project-level causes of intermittent build/deploy failure (e.g., dependency/install issues, typecheck/build errors, missing configuration) so that consecutive deployments can be executed reliably.

projectName: Re-run deployment and stabilize build for Draft Version 2
